about_the_game:
Welcome to the high-stakes world of Rogue Robot: Escape Protocol, a roguelike platformer that combines fast-paced action with strategic gameplay. Step into the metallic shoes of a series of little red rouge robots trying to escape a perilous factory filled with deadly traps, relentless enemies, and challenging bosses.

Key Features:
Different Paths: Make no two runs are the same! Each escape attempt will take you through a series of levels with mulitple exit points. Find different ways to make it free.



Fast-Paced Platforming Action: Navigate through intricate platforming sequences that test your reflexes and precision. Leap across gaps, dodge hazards, and outmaneuver enemies to reach the exit.

Challenging Combat: Face off against an array of robotic adversaries. Use your skills and upgrades to defeat enemies and overcome formidable boss battles.



Dynamic Power-Ups: Collect and utilize a variety of power-ups to enhance your abilities. From double jumps and dashes to slow motion and hover capabilities, each run offers different upgrades that can change the course of your escape.

Sci-Fi Factory Setting: Immerse yourself in a dystopian, cyberpunk-inspired factory environment. The atmospheric visuals and sound design pull you into a world where every corner holds a new danger.

Forest Inc: Yes, you read this right. They're at it again, ensure you put a stop to their plans. Set in the world of Bear No Grudge

In Rogue Robot: Escape Protocol, you are not just a player; you are part of a rebellion. Help our little red robot break free from the oppressive factory, one daring escape at a time. Each run brings you closer to freedom and unveils more of the story behind this evil corporation

Are you ready to lead the charge? Download Rogue Robot: Escape Protocol and start your escape today!

name: Rogue Robot: Escape Protocol

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory

short_description: Take control of a little red robot on a daring mission to escape a factory filled with deadly traps, relentless enemies, and multiple paths in this rogue-lite platformer that blends fast-paced action with intense gameplay
